title: Normal Draft penalty
body: I just started a normal draft game and i didnt lock on my champion but it was selected, so it was fine for 2 3 secs then i got 5 min penalty for leaving champion select?? sry for bad eng

replies.body: Heya, it sounds like you received a [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging) for leaving champion select.  If it happens again, it can escalate to a 30 minute timer.  Make sure to lock in that champ!
